title: T207 FS Tough Cycles Left - $320 for both or indv prices cut 10/10

posts.post_title: T207 FS Tough Cycles Left - $320 for both or indv prices cut 10/10
posts.post_content:
Shipping is included. Paypal friends & family preferred or check/m.o. are both ok.  Obviously any dickering going on with a card will not be honored if someone comes in at full price offer. 

Wallace Anonymous - SOLD
Hyatt Cycle - $200 drop to $175 drop to $16o to $155
Kirke Cycle - $220 drop to $200 drop to $185 to $175
Hartley Broadleaf - SOLD
Woodburn Cycle - SOLD
Wilson Broadleaf -   SOLD
